titleStmt.title: The judgment of Mr. Baxter concerning ceremonies and conformity in the points of difference betwixt the Church of England and the dissenters novv published in vindication of the moderate and learned part of the Presbyterians, to let the vvorld see that they are not so irreconcilable to the discipline of the Church of England, as some people vvould have us believe.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

titleStmt.title: The judgment of Mr. Baxter concerning ceremonies and conformity in the points of difference betwixt the Church of England and the dissenters novv published in vindication of the moderate and learned part of the Presbyterians, to let the vvorld see that they are not so irreconcilable to the discipline of the Church of England, as some people vvould have us believe.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Printed at London, and Re-printed at Edinburgh :
